Epidemiologic evidence of a viral role in triggering KD is suggested by seasonal epidemics,
12 and a number of viruses such as adenovirus, rhinovirus, influenza, Boca virus and enterovirus have been implicated.
13 14 Of note, coronaviruses are included in the list of viruses known to trigger KD, and a high suspicion for the two species HCoV-NH and HCoV-NL63 raised, but studies eventually gave conflicting results.
15 16 The possible role of SARS-COV-2 in ‘classic’ KD pathogenesis has yet to be determined but in view of what previously discussed current evidence does not seem to support this hypothesis.
